html:
Individual Games Technology Portfolio

This module is all about employability and making sure you are targeting the job you want in the games industry and that you have the skills and evidence to get it. This module will teach you how to optimise both your CV and your portfolio, challenging you to target a job, and then author a project that demonstrates you can successfully apply for that job.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  The ability to create an external web presence that communicates your readiness to enter the workplace – Application, Communication

+  The ability to reflect upon your skills, ascertain your own strengths and communicate them. – Analysis, Learning, Reflection

Module Content:
